law.catch_line: Report of gross earnings from intrastate business.
law.text: To ascertain the amount of the assessment provided for in KRS 278.130, each utility shall, on or before March 31 of each year, file with the commission a report of its gross earnings or receipts derived from intrastate business for the preceding calendar year.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 18, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 379, sec. 20, effective April 1, 1979. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3952-55.
